foreignData.name: Verzerrte Scheußlichkeit
foreignData.text:
{B}: Regeneriere die Verzerrte Scheußlichkeit.
Sumpfumwandlung {2} ({2}, wirf diese Karte aus deiner Hand ab: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Sumpfkarte, zeige diese Karte offen vor und nimm sie auf deine Hand. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.)

foreignData.name: Abominación torcida
foreignData.text:
{B}: Regenera la Abominación torcida.
Ciclo de pantano {2} ({2}, descartar esta carta: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de pantano, muéstrala y ponla en tu mano. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.)

foreignData.name: Abomination perverse
foreignData.text:
{B} : Régénérez l'Abomination perverse.
Recyclage de marais {2} ({2}, défaussez-vous de cette carte : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de marais, révélez-la, et mettez-la dans votre main. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.)

foreignData.name: Abominio Folle
foreignData.text:
{B}: Rigenera l'Abominio Folle.
Ciclopalude {2} ({2}, Scarta questa carta: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta Palude, rivelala e aggiungila alla tua mano. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.)

foreignData.name: よじれた嫌悪者
foreignData.text:
{B}：よじれた嫌悪者を再生する。
沼サイクリング {2} （{2}, このカードを捨てる：あなたのライブラリーから沼カードを１枚探し、それを公開してあなたの手札に加える。 その後、あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ゾンビ・ミュータント

foreignData.name: Abominação Distorcida
foreignData.text:
{B}: Regenere Abominação Distorcida.
Reciclar Pântano {2} ({2}, Descarte este card: Procure em seu grimório por um card do tipo Pântano, revele-o e coloque-o em sua mão. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.)

foreignData.name: Кривая Мерзость
foreignData.text:
{B}: Регенерировать Кривую Мерзость.
Цикл Болот {2} ({2}, Сбросьте эту карту: Поищите карту Болото в своей библиотеке, покажите ее и положите в свою руку. Потом перемешайте вашу библиотеку.)

foreignData.name: 曲恶憎恨兽
foreignData.text:
{B}：重生曲恶憎恨兽。
循环沼泽{2}（{2}，从你手上弃掉此牌：从你的牌库中搜寻一张沼泽牌，展示该牌，并置于你手上。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。）

name: Twisted Abomination
originalText:
{B}: Regenerate Twisted Abomination.
Swampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

rulings.text: Unlike the normal cycling ability, Swampcycling doesn't allow you to draw a card. Instead, it lets you search your library for a Swamp card. After you find a Swamp card in your library, you reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

Swampcycling is a form of cycling. Any ability that triggers on a card being cycled also triggers on Swampcycling this card. Any ability that stops a cycling ability from being activated also stops Swampcycling from being activated.

Swampcycling is an activated ability. Effects that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle or Rings of Brighthearth) will interact with Swampcycling. Effects that interact with spells (such as Remove Soul or Faerie Tauntings) will not.
You can choose to find any card with the Swamp land type, including nonbasic lands. You can also choose not to find a card, even if there is a Swamp card in your library.

text:
{B}: Regenerate Twisted Abomination.
Swampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
